Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") InsertService = game:GetService("InsertService")
GhostScript = script:WaitForChild("GhostScript")
Grips = { Equip = CFrame.new(0, -0.5, 0.25, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1), Display = CFrame.new(3.25, -0.75, -0.5, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1) }
GhostModel = InsertService:LoadAsset(179296736) Ghost = GhostModel:GetChildren()[1]:Clone() if GhostModel and GhostModel.Parent then GhostModel:Destroy() end
Tool.Grip = Grips.Equip
Tool.Enabled = true
function Activated() if not Tool.Enabled or not CheckIfAlive() or game:GetService("Workspace"):FindFirstChild(Player.Name .. Ghost.Name) then return end
GhostClone = Ghost:Clone() GhostClone.Name = (Player.Name .. Ghost.Name)
local GhostHumanoid = GhostClone:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local GhostTorso = GhostClone:FindFirstChild("Torso")
if GhostHumanoid and GhostTorso and GhostHumanoid.Health > 0 then
Tool.Enabled = false
local Creator = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator.Name = "Creator" Creator.Value = Player Creator.Parent = GhostClone
local BodyGyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro") BodyGyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(math.huge, math.huge, math.huge) BodyGyro.Parent = GhostTorso
local BodyPosition = Instance.new("BodyPosition") BodyPosition.maxForce = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) BodyPosition.Parent = GhostTorso
local GhostScriptClone = GhostScript:Clone() GhostScriptClone.Disabled = false GhostScriptClone.Parent = GhostClone
GhostClone.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace")
GhostTorso.CFrame = Torso.CFrame - Torso.CFrame.lookVector * (Torso.Size.Z + 3)
Tool:Destroy()
end
end
function CheckIfAlive() return (Character.Parent and Player.Parent and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0 and Torso.Parent) end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if not CheckIfAlive() then return end end
function Unequipped() end
Tool.Activated:connect(Activated) Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Figure = script.Parent
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Creator = Figure:FindFirstChild("Creator")
Humanoid = Figure:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Head = Figure:FindFirstChild("Head") Torso = Figure:FindFirstChild("Torso")
HealthDisplay = script:WaitForChild("HealthDisplay")
Gravity = 196.20
BasePart = Instance.new("Part") BasePart.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic BasePart.Shape = Enum.PartType.Block BasePart.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth BasePart.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth BasePart.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom BasePart.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) BasePart.Locked = true BasePart.CanCollide = true
function Destroy() Debris:AddItem(Figure, 2) end
function GetTotalMass(Parent) local Mass = 0 local function GetMass(Parent) for i, v in pairs(Parent:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("BasePart") then Mass = (Mass + v:GetMass()) end GetMass(v) end end GetMass(Parent) return Mass end
if not Creator or not Creator.Value or not Creator.Value.Parent or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 or not Head or not Torso then Destroy() return end
Player = Creator.Value Character = Player.Character
BodyGyro = Torso:FindFirstChild("BodyGyro") BodyPosition = Torso:FindFirstChild("BodyPosition")
if not Player or not Character or not BodyGyro or not BodyPosition then Destroy() return end
PlayerHumanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") PlayerTorso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso")
if not PlayerHumanoid or PlayerHumanoid.Health == 0 or not PlayerTorso then Destroy() return end
Player.Changed:connect(function(Property) if not Player.Parent then Destroy() end end)
Character.Changed:connect(function(Property) if not Character.Parent then Destroy() end end)
Humanoid.Changed:connect(function(Property) DamageFrame.Size = UDim2.new((1 / (Humanoid.MaxHealth / Humanoid.Health)), 0, 1, 0) if not Humanoid.Parent or Humanoid.Health == 0 then Destroy() end end)
PlayerHumanoid.Changed:connect(function(Property) if not PlayerHumanoid.Parent or PlayerHumanoid.Health == 0 then Destroy() end end)
HealthDisplay.Adornee = Head HealthDisplay.Enabled = true
DamageFrame = HealthDisplay.Frame.Frame
DamageFrame.Size = UDim2.new((1 / (Humanoid.MaxHealth / Humanoid.Health)), 0, 1, 0)
Spawn(function() local HealTick = 0 local SelfHealTick = 0 local Mass = ((GetTotalMass(Figure) * Gravity) * 100) BodyPosition.maxForce = Vector3.new(Mass, Mass, Mass) while BodyGyro.Parent and BodyPosition.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0 do BodyGyro.cframe = PlayerTorso.CFrame local Position = (PlayerTorso.CFrame + PlayerTorso.CFrame.lookVector * -(PlayerTorso.Size.Z * 1.5)) Position = (Position + (Position * CFrame.Angles(0, (math.pi / 2), 0)).lookVector * (Torso.Size.X * 2)).p BodyPosition.position = Position if (tick() - SelfHealTick) >= 1 then Humanoid.Health = (Humanoid.Health + 5) SelfHealTick = tick() end if PlayerHumanoid.Health < PlayerHumanoid.MaxHealth and (tick() - HealTick) >= 2 then local HealSphere = BasePart:Clone() HealSphere.Name = "HealSphere" HealSphere.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Teal") HealSphere.Transparency = 0.5 HealSphere.Size = Vector3.new(0.75, 0.75, 0.75) HealSphere.CanCollide = false local Mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") Mesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.Sphere Mesh.Parent = HealSphere Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) local BodyVelocity = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") BodyVelocity.maxForce = Vector3.new(Mass, Mass, Mass) BodyVelocity.Parent = HealSphere Debris:AddItem(HealSphere, 2) HealSphere.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") HealSphere.CFrame = Torso.CFrame HealSphere.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if not Hit or not Hit.Parent then return end if Hit.Parent == Character then PlayerHumanoid.Health = (PlayerHumanoid.Health + 5) HealSphere:Destroy() end end) Spawn(function() while HealSphere and HealSphere.Parent and BodyVelocity and BodyVelocity.Parent do BodyVelocity.velocity = CFrame.new(HealSphere.Position, PlayerTorso.Position).lookVector * 20 HealSphere.Velocity = BodyVelocity.velocity wait(0.1) end end) HealTick = tick() if PlayerHumanoid.Health == PlayerHumanoid.MaxHealth then HealTick = 0 end end wait(0.1) end end)
